Message:
Today, another one of
my pupils is graduating
from my instruction.

“I want the strength
to protect those I love.”
Those were the words
she imparted to me,
so I taught her every
combat technique I know.

In turn, she overcame every
grueling trial I threw at her.

Seeing just how
capable she had become,
I couldn’t hold back
the barrage of tears
threatening to spill out.

The power you’ve gained is just
proof of your unfaltering
efforts all this time.”

“Now, go! No matter
what anyone may say,
you’ll always be
my prided pupil!”

Some time later,
I heard that my pupil’s army
emerged victorious in battle.

But, only her beloved blade
made it home
from the battlefield.
